data.name: CreateDashboardStagingPriority35
ReadCseOrganization
data.value: select ORGANZTN_ID, TYPE_CODE from CKT_CSE_ORGANIZATN where TYPE_CODE = 'J' order by ORGANZTN_ID

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select top(1) REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, RET_SERV_DAYS_NMR, RET_SRV_DAYS_DNOM, RET_SERV_DAYS_AVG from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 where (REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth) and (REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel) and (REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId)

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, RET_SERV_DAYS_NMR, RET_SRV_DAYS_DNOM, RET_SERV_DAYS_AVG from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 where (REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth) and (REPORT_LEVEL = 'JD')

data.name: ReadFipsTribunal
data.value: select top(1) T1.[STATE], T1.COUNTY, T1.LOCATION, T1.COUNTY_DESC, T1.STATE_ABBREVIATION, T2.TRIBUNAL_NM, T2.JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, T2.IDENTIFIER from CKT_FIPS T1 join CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 on (T2.IDENTIFIER = @identifier) and (T1.LOCATION = T2.FIP_LOCATION) and (T1.COUNTY = T2.FIP_COUNTY) and (T1.[STATE] = T2.FIP_STATE) and (T1.COUNTY > 0)

data.name: ReadLegalActionServiceProcess
data.value: select T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.CLASSIFICATION, T1.ACTION_TAKEN, T1.FILED_DT, T1.STANDARD_NO, T1.CREATED_TSTAMP, T1.TRB_ID, T2.RETURN_DATE, T2.IDENTIFIER from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 join CKT_SERVICE_PROCSS T2 on (T2.RETURN_DATE between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) and (T1.CREATED_TSTAMP < @createdTstamp) and (T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T2.LGA_IDENTIFIER) and ( ( (T1.CLASSIFICATION = 'U') and (T1.ACTION_TAKEN = 'UNIFORMP') ) or (T1.CLASSIFICATION = 'P') ) order by T1.CREATED_TSTAMP desc

data.name: ReadLegalReferralCase
data.value: select distinct T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.STATUS_DATE, T1.STATUS, T1.REFERRAL_DATE, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_1, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_2, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_3, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_4 from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL T1 join CKT_LEG_REF_CROLE T3 on (T1.IDENTIFIER = T3.LGR_ID) and (T1.CAS_NUMBER = T3.CAS_NUMBER) and (T1.CAS_NUMBER = T3.CAS_NUMBER_ROLE) and (T3.CRO_TYPE = 'CH') and (T1.REFERRAL_DATE <= @referralDate) and ( ( (T1.STATUS in ('O', 'S')) and (T1.STATUS_DATE <= @statusDate) ) or ( (T1.STATUS in ('R', 'W', 'C')) and (T1.STATUS_DATE >= @statusDate) ) ) join CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS T6 on (T3.CSP_NUMBER = T6.CSP_NUMBER) and (@lgaIdentifier = T6.LGA_IDENTIFIER) join CKT_LA_PER_LA_CROL T7 on (T6.LA_PERSON_ID = T7.LAP_ID) and (T7.CRO_TYPE = 'CH') and (T3.CSP_NUMBER = T7.CSP_NUM) and (T1.CAS_NUMBER = T7.CAS_NUM) and (@lgaIdentifier = T7.LGA_ID) order by T1.REFERRAL_DATE desc

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority35
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set AS_OF_DATE = @asOfDate, RET_SERV_DAYS_NMR = @retServDaysNmr, RET_SRV_DAYS_DNOM = @retSrvDaysDnom, RET_SERV_DAYS_AVG = @retServDaysAvg where (REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth) and (REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel) and (REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId)
